Dragos: Stepped in front of Malice looking into Malice's Optics sensor, "you listen to Me Malice what Rodimus Prime just did was done out of Honor. Azure was once a proud Worrior oh wait still is. Azure is sick right now. Are you sugesting that Rodimus should of been a How would you put it a INSANLY NEANDERTHULIC BEAST to try and wage war inside the Base with Azure becouse Azure can't Control his self right now. Well I think not. He did it to protect his men. I would of made the same Decision if I was in his place," Dragos Chuckles a bit, "Just remember this I and my crew is a group of assasins or mercs you can call us. I would love to stick my foot up anyone's Exast manifold if they chose to Argue with Rodimus Orders." he draws his sword, "I will not think twice about scrapping anyone I repeat ANYONE who choses to argue with a commanding officer," He seaths his Kitana and starts to walk out of the room towards the exit.

bustercross365 <bustercross365@...> wrote:Malice watched with cold optics as the Predacon passed him and left.  
He advanced into the CR room and decided to address Rodimus.
"Your just going to let a Predacon leave your base?  You didn't do 
the same thing with a Decepticon, as I recall.  Why did you release 
him?" Malice demanded.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
>  
> Rodimus stepped aside to let Azure leave. They now knew where they 
had to go. If the matrix wasn't on earth with the survivor council 
then it was lost somewhere on Tripred cybertron.
>  
> He almost wished that his troops would not have asked any further 
questions, but they did and Azure was now a Predacon.
>  
> Rodimus lets out a sigh, letting this sink in. Azure had sacrificed 
his programming, his very spark to bring back Nightlight. Rodimus 
would forever owe him.
>  
> Rodimus Prime(whispering to himself): Thank you, Azure...
>  
> Rodimus takes Nightlight's hand tightly, sensing the guilt she felt.
> 
>
